backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature request referencing frontend/App.tsx and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components and theme files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and color variables defining a themed palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with a root div loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component showing Maniha and a bestie question with growing Yes button, floating hearts, and success screen trigger.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates animated floating heart elements with randomized positions and animations.
frontend/src/components/SuccessMessage.t: Displays the success screen with confetti hearts, large decorative elements, and celebratory text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity state, and AuthClient behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind styles plus Valentine-themed color variables and animations for hearts and effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors, container settings, animations, and extended theme values.
project_state.json: Defines the projectâ€™s state, including feature updates, requirements, and pending requests related to name and text changes.
